Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_3D_rolloff_factor

The function AIL_set_3D_rolloff_factor sets the provider's global 3D rolloff factor.

void AIL_set_3D_rolloff_factor(
  HPROVIDER provider,
  F32 factor
);

In Parameters

provider
indicates the provider to set.
factor
indicates new rolloff factor to use.

Discussion

The rolloff factor controls how fast 3D audio will falloff with distance. The default is 1.0 which means no change to the "real-world" falloff speed. You can double the falloff by using 2.0, and you can turn off the falloff completely by using 0.0.

Use the AIL_set_3D_sample_distances function to control the falloff curve for each sample.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_3D_rolloff_factor, AIL_set_3D_sample_distances
Related Basic Types: F32, HPROVIDER, void
